analysis.description:
Crowdsale.transferToAddress (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#197-204) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(targetWallet,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#202-204)

Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#226-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol)

GMPToken.totalSupply.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#96) shadows:
	- GMPToken.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#96)
	- GMPToken.totalSupply (state variable @ /unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#74-75)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply (function @ /unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#48-50)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of GMPToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#98) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of GMPToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x9337651f1dfac7f858d4e08a2da27b001e6af6b8.sol#111-114) is not in mixedCase
